about_the_game:
Explore the Horrors of the Backrooms
Dive into a hair-raising journey through the Backrooms, featuring unique levels filled with mysteries, terrifying creatures, and different challenges to escape. Each floor holds dark secrets and distinct ways to survive – are you ready to run?

Play with Friends

Gather 1-6 friends to find the way out and share responsibilities as you work together to overcome challenges. No friends available? Don’t worry! Our lobby will help you find rooms with other players also looking for teammates.

Immersive Voice Chat

Enhance your gaming experience with our immersive voice chat, designed to capture every whisper and scream with AAA-quality sound. Truly feel inside the Backrooms as you collaborate or fight for your life alongside your teammates.

Continuous Support and Updates

We’re committed to the community! With new levels, creatures, and game modes added regularly, your experience will never grow stale. Actively participate by sending suggestions and shaping the future of the game.

Explore the Horrors of the Backrooms
Dive into a hair-raising journey through the Backrooms, featuring unique levels filled with mysteries, terrifying creatures, and different challenges to escape. Each floor holds dark secrets and distinct ways to survive – are you ready to run?

Play with Friends

Gather 1-6 friends to find the way out and share responsibilities as you work together to overcome challenges. No friends available? Don’t worry! Our lobby will help you find rooms with other players also looking for teammates.

Immersive Voice Chat

Enhance your gaming experience with our immersive voice chat, designed to capture every whisper and scream with AAA-quality sound. Truly feel inside the Backrooms as you collaborate or fight for your life alongside your teammates.

Continuous Support and Updates

We’re committed to the community! With new levels, creatures, and game modes added regularly, your experience will never grow stale. Actively participate by sending suggestions and shaping the future of the game.
name: Run the Backrooms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz / AMD FX-6300, 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760, (2 GB VRAM) | AMD Radeon HD 7870, (2 GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with (4GB VRAM) | NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4GB VRAM )
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: Run the Backrooms is a cooperative horror game that supports up to 6 players. The game has several levels and entities that will certainly make your gameplay very exciting. The game has free updates, always bringing new game levels and bug fixes.
